# newAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest

**Instance Property**

An updated request for an automatic reload payment.

## Declaration

```swift
ApplePayAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest newAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest;
```

## Discussion

Provide this object to update the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/automaticReloadPaymentRequest] value in the original [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest], if necessary, after the user updated their payment method.



## Updating automatic reload payments

- **ApplePayAutomaticReloadPaymentRequest**: A dictionary that represents a request to set up an automatic reload payment, such as a store card top-up or a prepaid account.
